Paragraph: A few literatures reported phthalimide - containing conjugated polymers such as poly-(phenylene ethynylene)s , 12 a polyaniline derivative , 13 and a polythiophene derivative.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
|--------------|
| Phthalimide |
| Poly-(phenylene ethynylene)s |
| A polyaniline derivative |
| A polythiophene derivative |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

|--------------|

| Polyaniline derivative |

Note: In this case, all the entities in the paragraph can be considered as material names since they refer to specific types of polymers.
